subject: GUI Runner, Class Loader & excluded.properties
msgSnippet: I ve run into a problem referenced several time here on the mailing list, but the work around doesn t seem to do anything for me. I extracted
messageBody:
I've run into a problem referenced several time here on the mailing list,
but the work around doesn't seem to do anything for me.

I extracted excluded.properties. Modified it to add "excluded.6=org.*", and
placed it my classes directory (which IS the first thing in my class path).
But, when I run the gui runner, I still get:

java.lang.LinkageError: Class org/xml/sax/HandlerBase violates loader
constraints
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass0(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:486)
, , ,

Any ideas? Would and include be simpler than an exclude for future
versions?
